en: As balanced major preferences become more popular, many universities have already stopped using major point deductions, but some universities still use this method, and from the “Admissions Guidelines” published by each school, we know that this year, major point deductions are applied at over 20 universities.

zh: 比如四川农业大学，山东科技大学，黑龙江中医药大学，江苏科技大学，江西师范大学，成都医学院，东北电力大学，集美大学，南京医科大学，南京工业大学，宁夏大学，山东理工大学，中国民用航空飞行学院等。
en: These include Sichuan Agricultural University, Shandong University of Science and Technology, Heilongjiang University of Chinese Medicine, Jiangsu University of Science and Technology, Jiangxi Normal University, Chengdu Medical College, Northeast Electric Power University, Jimei University, Nanjing Medical University, Nanjing Tech University, Ningxia University, Shandong University of Technology, and Civil Aviation Flight University of China.

zh: 在这些高校中，每所大学设置的专业级差都不营养。
en: The major point deduction values applied at each of these universities are different.

zh: 有的高校在每个专业都设有级差，比如宁夏的档案已投到，该校的考生根据考生填报专业职员的顺序，一次第1年一份后按分数排序录取。
en: Some apply the same point deductions to every major, such as Ningxia University, where an applicant can expect to find 1 point deducted for each major in the order of major preference.

zh: 而有的大学在不同的专业之间设置了不同的专业级差。
en: Other universities use different fixed point values for different universities.

zh: 比如既没打去专业志愿级差，总分值为十分及第一专业志愿与其他专业职员，级差为三分，而其他专业志愿间不设级差，实为平行支援其他专业职员与跳起传与致远舰，专业级差为一份儿。
en: Jimei University, for example, applies a total deduction of 4 points, meaning there is a difference of 3 points between a student’s first preferred major and other preferred majors, among preferred majors after the first there is no further deduction by preference (meaning they receive equal deductions), and there is a 1 point difference between preferred majors after the first and non-preferred majors.

zh: 填报志愿是考生及家长，一定要认真阅读所报学校的录取政策，看看有没有专业极差极差的形式是怎么样的，在充分考虑防暑的同时，还要合理分析你选的学校和专业院校，在招生章程中明确采取防鼠检查方式进行录取，考生在选择。
en: When reporting major preferences, students and parents must be sure to carefully read the university’s admissions policies to see if there are major point deductions, and while considering the point values, must also carefully consider their universities and majors of choice; if the university lists clear major point deductions in the Admission Guidelines, they should pay close attention to the point tiers of different majors so they can maximize their chances of admission.

zh: 今年第1场大西洋飓风登陆受疫情重创的德克萨斯。
en: The year’s first Atlantic hurricane makes landfall in epidemic-ravaged Texas

zh: 没有国家飓风中心当天早上宣布那是苏大道，145公里预计指导下南部和墨西哥东北部造成强降雨将有会引发凶猛的洪水。
en: The US National Hurricane Center announced this morning that Hurricane Hannah reaches speeds of 145 kph, and that it is expected to cause heavy rains in southern Texas and northeastern Mexico, which may in turn cause flash floods.

zh: 目前随着逐步向鲁厂推进，风速已经有所减弱，尽管局部地区停电，但暂时没有伤亡统计报告。
en: As the hurricane gradually moves toward land, wind speeds have weakened, and although some areas have experienced power outages, there have been no reports of fatalities so far.

zh: 德克萨斯的一些地方官员正在准备应对，很有可能在沿海地带出现了龙卷风。
en: Some local officials in Texas are making preparation for tornadoes that may appear in coastal areas.

zh: 总统特朗普通过推特表示办公室正在严密监控和夏威夷群岛格拉斯的动态，并呼吁民众听取当地政府的经济管理系，保护家庭和财产。
en: On Twitter, President Trump said that his office is closely monitoring developments surrounding Hurricane Hannah and Hurricane Douglas in Hawaii, and he asked the public to listen closely for information on the emergency broadcast system, as well as to take steps to protect their families and assets.

zh: 与此同时，邓萨斯州的相关疫情也正在急剧恶化，感染人数不断飙升，累计确诊感染者超过39万人，死亡人数超过5000人。
en: Concurrently, the COVID-19 epidemic has worsened dramatically in Texas; the number of infection has surged, with a total of over 390,000 confirmed cases and more than 5,000 deaths.

zh: 因此军方来气，政府将面临收容无家可归者同时放之李庆再度恶化的双重难度。
en: As the hurricane hits, the government faces the dual problems of sheltering the homeless while preventing the epidemic from getting worse.

zh: 首都成立专委会及提前尝月第三届警博会，参展商联盟狗主颈部牛奶新华网。
en: Special Committee was firstly established, and all members sign “long-term contract”, Exhibitors at the 3rd China International Import Expo form an “Import Expo Bond” -- Xinhua Net

zh: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第3届警博会参展商联盟第1次会议现场。
en: The site of the first conference of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo, photographed in Shanghai on July 26, 2020.

zh: 新华社上海7月26日电，记者26日第3届进口博览会参展商联盟，在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会，包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳液专为35家成员企业，还签订了三年长期参展合作备忘录，金博会参展商联盟的牛。
en: Xinhua News Agency Shanghai July 26, 2020 (Journalist: Zhou Rui) On July 26, 2020, the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo founded special committees for the first time, including the Public Health and Pandemic Control Special Committee and Dairy Industry Special Committee; 35 member enterprises signed the memo of long-term exhibition cooperation for three years, further enhancing, the bonds of the exhibitor alliance.

zh: 26日在此间举行的第三届金博会参展商联盟，第1次会议上，韩国现代，美国陶氏化学，日本资生堂，醒来牛市了，德国西门子，我们一起领英国阿斯利康等一批战盟成员企业签订了三年长期参展合作备忘录修订和完善后的张檬，张承业。
en: During the first conference of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo on July 26, a group of member enterprises including Hyundai, Dow Chemical Industry, Shiseido, TheLand, Siemens, Michelin, and AstraZeneca signed memo of long-term exhibition cooperation for three years, and the charter of alliance was also first publicized after the amendment.

zh: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
en: The site of the opening ceremony of the Dairy Special Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26, 2020.

zh: 根据最新的章程，将引入牵头单位共治机制，加强专委会功能。
en: According to the latest charter, the alliance will introduce the rotation chairmanship system for the committee to enhance its functions.

zh: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
en: The special committee will propose suggestions to promote the sustainable development of industry according to analysis of industrial development trend.

zh: 同时整合行业全产业链资源，一大袋小袋中关联企业参展，将停博会打造成为矿业企业。
en: At the same time, it will integrate resources from the whole production chain and initiate relevant enterprises to engage in the exhibition led by the large enterprises in an effort to build the Import Expo as a highlight for enterprises in diverse industries.

zh: 首次创立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前及相关肺炎疫情来说，显得尤为重要。
en: It founded the special committee of Public Health and Pandemic Control for the first time, which is of critical importance to fight against COVID-19.

zh: 所谓第3节请博会，公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，压配快速诊断业务大中华区总经理，邱建平说下一步雅培会享受更多行业伙伴，探索性的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击相关肺炎预警。
en: As the vice presidential institution of the public health and pandemic control committee of the 3rd China International Imported Expo, Qiu Jianping, General Manager of the Rapid Diagnosis Division of Abbott Laboratories in Greater China, said that Abbott will explore new solutions and cooperation modes with more partners in the industry to support China and the world as a whole as they fight against COVID-19.

zh: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
en: The site of the Opening Ceremony of the Public Health and Pandemic Control Special Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26th, 2020.

zh: 局气，第3节请博会首次设立公共卫生防疫转去，截止目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
en: It is known that the special area for public health and pandemic control was first established at the 3rd China International Import Expo, and so far nearly 50 enterprises from around the world applying to attend the exhibition, with the whole exhibition area to exceed 10 thousand square meters.

zh: 在2018年首届金博会期间，经博会参展商联盟又沾上自发倡议成立，成为优质参展企业交流合作平台，链接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国地区车间，某商务往来与发展建言献策的质量平台。
en: During the 1st China International Import Expo in 2018, the Exhibitor Alliance was initiated by the exhibitors voluntarily, aiming to be a platform for communication and cooperation between outstanding enterprises and a platform to share information and resources between different parties, as well as a think-tank to promote the economics and trade between China and other countries (regions) in the world.

zh: 截至目前已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
en: So far, there are 142 enterprises who have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions in the world.

zh: 比利时三岁女童死于相关病毒感染。
en: 3-year-old Girl in Belgium Dead of COVID-19 Infection - Xinhuanet

zh: 吉林市卫生部门24日说，散水泥同时与相关病毒感染带过最年幼的性观，并望患者。
en: A 3-year-old girl died of a COVID-19 infection in Belgium, making her the youngest victim of COVID-19 infection in the country, Belgian health authorities said on the 24th.

zh: 比利时卫生部门发言人不得问，卡特里说这名女童感染相关病毒已经有其他严重疾病，除了这名女童经济还有一名18岁青年时与相关病毒感染。
en: Belgian Health Ministry spokesman Boudewijn Catry said that the girl had other serious diseases before she was infected with COVID-19; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old young man recently died of a COVID-19 infection.

zh: 派出所里说上周比例是85%，行政星关区政人员年龄在60岁以下。
en: Catry said that last week, 85% of the newly diagnosed people in Belgium were under the age of 60.

zh: Party因身体健康，年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
en: He reminded the healthy and younger people not to take it lightly.

zh: 虽然年轻人死于病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。
en: "Although it is rare for young people to die of COVID-19 infection, no one is now immune. ”

zh: 上周比利时行政相关确诊病例比前一周增长89%，每日平均2.9人，死于相关病毒感染高于前一周的日均1.7。
en: Last week, Belgium saw an 89% increase in new confirmed cases over the previous week, with an average of 2.9 people dying of a COVID-19 infection every day, higher than the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.

zh: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中病毒感染者占比在欧洲名列前茅。
en: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of the population infected with COVID-19 in Belgium was "among the highest" in Europe.

zh: 比利时有1100多万人口。
en: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

zh: 最新数据显示比例是累积64,847人感染相关名录。
en: The latest data shows that a cumulative total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with COVID-19.

zh: 卡特利本周早些时候警告在雪球越滚越大，最终造成雪崩前，人们必须采取行动。
en: Catry warned earlier this week that action must be taken before the snowball gets bigger and eventually causes an “avalanche”.

zh: 为控制疫情反弹，并以收缩肺胃，而每次23日宣布在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定，将更加严格，进一步接触限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
en: In an effort to contain the outbreak, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on Wednesday that the rules on wearing facial masks in public places would be tightened, and further lifting of restrictive measures in August would be suspended.

zh: 江苏省井外收入无症状感染者一例中新网。
en: Jiangsu Confirms 1 New Asymptomatic Overseas Imported Case-ChinaNews.com

zh: 中新网7月26日电，据江苏省委监委官方微博消息，7月25日0~20 45行政确诊病例。
en: Chinanews.com, July 26 According to the official Weibo of the Jiangsu Provincial Healthcare Commission, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were no new confirmed cases in Jiangsu.

zh: 截止7月25日二十四时，全省累计报告确诊病例655，理器中平稳收入24里，处一里井外输入确诊病例，在定点医院隔离治疗外，其余均已出院。
en: As of 24:00 on July 25, there are 655 cumulative confirmed cases reported (including 24 overseas imported cases), all of which have been discharged from the hospital except for 1 confirmed overseas imported case in isolation for treatment at a designated hospital.

zh: 当日行政境外输入无症状感染者一例。
en: One new asymptomatic overseas imported case was reported on that day.

zh: 截至7月25日24:00，正在集中隔离和艺术管理的无症状感染者实力，为情为输入。
en: As of 24:00 on July 25, all 4 asymptomatic patients in isolation and under medical attention are overseas imported cases.

zh: 目前全省推动的确诊病例和无症状感染者的密切接触者，14,084人，已接触医学，观察13,943人，尚有141人正在接受医学观察。
en: At present, 14,084 close contacts of confirmed cases and asymptomatic cases were tracked down, with 13,943 having completed medical observation and 141 still under medical observation.

zh: 新华社香港7月25日电，香港特区政府商务及经济发展局局长邱腾华25日表示，所有亚太经合组织成员经济体应行动一致，共同抗议，促进经济复苏，并依据世界贸易组织所定的权利和义务，避免建立不必要的贸易壁垒。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, reported July 25th On the 25th, the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government Commerce and Economic Development Bureau director Qiu Tenghua said that all APEC countries must act in unison to combat the pandemic and push for economic recovery, and that they should abide by the rights and obligations established by the WTO to avoid creating unnecessary trade barriers.

zh: 智能化时代参加亚太经合组织应为25日召开的贸易部长及相关肺炎疫情视频会议时作出上述表示的。
en: Qiu Tenghua made these statements while attending the APEC Ministers Responsible for Trade Virtual Meeting to discuss the COVID-19 epidemic held on the 25th.

zh: 在此次会议中，与会部长就亚太经合组织应对相关肺炎疫情冲击以及景区内经济复苏可采区的实施方案交流意见。
en: At this meeting, the ministers in attendance discussed substantive plans APEC can enact to cope with the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic and promote economic recovery within the region.

zh: 求同化表示这次疫情处罚的公共卫生和经济危机，对社会和经济带来前所未有的生源影响。
en: Qiu Tenghua said the public health and economic crisis due to the pandemic have caused a deep and unprecedented impact on society and the economy.

zh: 我们正处于一场双重专一，我们必须战胜已经挽回经济。
en: “We now face a two-front battle, and we must first defeat the pandemic before we can create economic recovery.

zh: 我们要目标明确并都是我们的共同敌人合作才可取得，省里翻制只会失败。
en: Our goal must be clear: the virus is our common enemy, and cooperation is the only way to defeat it; without it, we will fail. “

zh: 秋虫化石，相关肺炎疫情引发的连串贸易限制主控制疫情。
en: Qiu Tenghua said the series of trade restrictions in response to the COVID-19 outbreak would not help to control it.

zh: 某一是解决目前问题的关键，两份不是问题所在。
en: Trade is crucial to resolving current problems, and as such, should not be viewed as a problem.

zh: 他谴责所有的歧视性和凤凰的政策措施，并促请所有经济体在此关键时刻保持便捷开放，维持供应链的长生运作，避免建立贸易壁垒或采取不理性的贸易政策。
en: He condemned all policy measures that discriminate and differentiate, and advised that at such a critical moment, all economies keep their borders open, maintain smooth supply chain operations, and avoid implementing trade barriers or irrational trade policies.

zh: 梅州全程41.4万例相关病例，成为疫情第二严重中风，中新网。
en: Florida Becomes the Second Worst Hit State with 414,000 COVID-19 Confirmed Cases-ChinaNews.com

zh: 中新网7月26日电综合报导，美国约翰四世大学网站显示，截至北京时间26日8:34左右，美国佛罗里达州曝光了与41.4万相关确诊病例，超过纽约州的41.21万，成为亚洲之后的美国第二大依据。
en: Chinanews.com, July 26 According to the Johns Hopkins University website, as of 8:34am on 26th, Beijing time, Florida has reported over 414,000 COVID-19 confirmed cases, surpassing New York’s 411,000, and becoming the second worst “infected area” after California.

zh: 佛罗里达州卫生署25日称，佛州24日报告了124例死亡病例。
en: The Florida State Health Department said on 25th that Florida reported 124 death cases on 24th.

zh: 这是此行转达刘星开始依赖佛州的每日死亡人数第10次超过100人。
en: Since the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic, it’s the tenth daily death count over 100 in Florida.

zh: 局势，佛州疫情最严重的迈阿密，戴德军的兵力总数已经超过圣安里。
en: It is said that confirmed cases in the most affected Miami-Dade County, Florida are over 100,000.

zh: 亳州目前有8974例型冠住院患者，其中有1874例在迈阿密待了。
en: Currently, there are 8,974 hospitalized patients in Florida, 1,874 of whom are in Miami-Dade.

zh: 的确10日依赖该照相馆住院人数增加了79%。
en: Since July 4, COVID-19 hospitalization has increased 79%.

zh: 自从美国第1个咒语4月24日重新开放以来，有9.1万人的生命被夺走。
en: Since the first state re-opened on April 24, 91,000 lives have been taken by COVID-19.

zh: 根据约翰霍普金斯大学提供的数据，美国报告的确诊总数已经达到417点留碗里，只剩14.6万人死亡。
en: According to data provided by Johns Hopkins University, reported confirmed cases in the U.S. have reached 4.176 million, with at least 146,000 deaths.

zh: 成都人扎堆儿围观美领馆，警方组织人们看上去太高兴。
en: Crowds Gather in Chengdu to See the US Consulate, and the Police Stop People from 'Looking too Happy'

zh: 作为美国关闭中国驻休斯敦总领馆的回应，中方在本周五宣布关闭美国驻成都总领馆。
en: China on Friday announced the shutdown of the US Consulate General in Chengdu in response to the closure of the Chinese consulate in Houston.

zh: 周六梅岭观的会长被撤下周日，一辆上锁玻璃的汽车在路上的学生当中，实力灵魂。
en: On Saturday, the badge of the U.S. Consulate was removed, and on Sunday, a dark-glass car drove away amid boos from passers-by.

zh: 星期天，很多成都人扎堆儿在美领馆前拍照，没有来过的人应是10号骑行去龙山前来一看。
en: On Sunday, many people in Chengdu gathered in front of the U.S. Consulate to take photos, and even those who had never visited the consulate came to have a look, motivated by curiosity about current events.

zh: 滑行车成都站记者也去成都美领馆附近观察了一番，传回消息称好汽车络绎不绝，还有很多家长带着孩子来散步，观看该建筑拍照或者自拍。
en: AFP's Chengdu reporter also visited the US consulate in Chengdu and reported that curious people were coming in droves, as well as many parents with their children walking to see the consulate and taking pictures of the building or taking selfies.

zh: 静观周围围满了警卫，警察是不是矿中人物的行为，他们似乎不容许任何出格的行为出现，一名女子，刚刚开始准备唱红歌，就被叫停，还有一名警卫没收了一个条幅。
en: Guards swarmed around the consulate, and the police occasionally “corrected” people's behavior, seeming not to allow any transgressions: a woman was stopped just as she started singing a revolutionary song, and a guard confiscated a banner.

zh: 但附近一个住宅楼的居民在自家阳台上拉起了一个举行的中国国际，并含着支持中国的口号。
en: But residents of a nearby residential building managed to hang a giant Chinese flag on the balcony and shout pro-China slogans.

zh: 成都美领馆于1985年开放，覆盖美国在中国西南部的所有零食相关食物，尤其是西藏自治区。
en: The U.S. Consulate in Chengdu opened in 1985, and covered all U.S. consular affairs in Southwest China, especially in the Tibet Autonomous Region.

zh: 发行社成都展汽车表示中国政府对美国的反应相对而言比较克制。众多中国人在网上要求政府关闭美国驻香港领馆，官方支持关闭成都美领馆是对美国不合理行为，必要且合法的回应。
en: AFP's Chengdu reporter said that the Chinese government's response to the US was relatively restrained: many Chinese people asked the government to close the U.S. Consulate in Hong Kong on the Internet, but officials only said that "the shutdown of the US Consulate in Chengdu is a necessary and legal response to the unreasonable behavior of the United States."

zh: 目前除了成都之外，没有在华还有朱广东住上海住沈阳住武汉驻香港领馆。
en: At present, in addition to Chengdu, the United States also has consulates in Guangdong, Shanghai, Shenyang, Wuhan, and Hong Kong.

zh: 大型储媒体行动，从直播看图片出发，近日要闻，湖南日报，王华声在线。
en: Large-Scale Media Convergence Campaign "Watch Poverty Alleviation Livecast from Villages" Launches - Today's News - Hunan Daily Website - www.voc.com.cn

zh: 湖南日报湖南客户端7月25日讯，本报记者7月25日由中央广播电视总台，财经节目中心主办的大型媒体行动直播看图片从江苏徐州出发，亮亮现在无影无形，媒体一种用直播其中的大篷车在现场，嘉宾某总想换换时出现。
en: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client Terminal, July 25 (reporter from this organization) On July 25, two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province for the large-scale media convergence campaign "Watch Poverty Alleviation Livecast from Villages" sponsored by the China Media Group’s Financial Program Center.

zh: 习近平总书记指出，2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第1个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年。
en: General secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, because we will finish building a moderately prosperous society in all respects and realize the first centenary goal; 2020 is also a year of decisive victory for the elimination of poverty.”

zh: 大型储媒体行动是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心，为配合这一重大主题做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
en: The large-scale media convergence campaign "Watch Poverty Alleviation Livecast from Villages" is an important measure taken by the China Media Group’s Financial Program Center in coordination with this major theme and promote poverty alleviation.

zh: 该系统将走进全国20多个省，自治区，直辖市的图片，而挖掘现货图片故事，从容处某局面，展现村民如何突破生存发展空间，走向致富之路的历程。
en: The campaign will go into villages receiving poverty relief in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government to discover fresh poverty relief stories, directly view the huge changes in the appearance of the villages, and show how the villagers have overcome the difficulties of survival and development and moved towards the road of prosperity.

zh: 这次行动将持续三个多月。
en: The campaign will last more than three months.

zh: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路一路走西南线途径安徽湖北，江西，湖南，广西，贵州，四川，重庆，云南等地，另一路走西北线，途径河南，陕西，甘肃，青海，新疆，宁夏，内蒙古，山西，河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
en: Starting from Xuzhou, the reporter group divided and followed two routes: one is the southwest route, going through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet, and other places; the other is the northwest route, which goes through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei, and other places, covering a distance of more than 10 thousand kilometers.

zh: 在报道形式上不看图片，大胆融合。
en: In the format of its reports, "Watch Poverty Alleviation Livecast from Villages" uses a bold integrated style.

zh: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况都将通过中央广播电视总台，央视财经评论的阳光经济支撑，中国交通广播，央视财经向媒体进行播出。
en: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast on CCTV-2 of the China Media Group, CNR Business Radio, CNR China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.

zh: 其中电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目天下财经完成，收获10年，周日12:00~1:00，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目，经济情绪联部将开设脱贫报道传收货时间周一至周日，20:30~21:30.
en: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed during the noon news program "World Finance" on CCTV-2 (airs 12:00-13:00 from Monday to Sunday), and the primetime news program "Economic News" on CCTV-2 will air a special program on Poverty Alleviation (airs 20:30-21:30 from Monday to Sunday).

zh: 同事大篷车将对所到的每一个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达一小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经评论，可以贯穿直播参与抽奖活动。
en: Meanwhile, the caravan will carry out a 1-hour live broadcast of each village on the CCTV Finance App, where the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in a lucky draw by downloading the CCTV Finance App.

zh: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，邹城直播看图片，勇于突破，收藏了外长向媒体大篷车。
en: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Watch Poverty Alleviation Livecast from Villages" makes a bold breakthrough, pioneering the "new media caravan in the field" model.

zh: 该车搭载5英寸型媒体移动用直播系统，利用录音文件时应问不应妄加应用技术，实现线上线下大屏小屏电视广播的有机结合。
en: Each caravan is equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve the organic fusion of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and TV broadcasting.

zh: 配置上，雄彦博去演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米，宽2.55米，高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以释放120度。
en: They are equipped with a 3-channel studio area made of retrofitted storage containers that are 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide and 3.98 meters high, and which have automatic hydraulic expansion structure, and can be turned upwards up to 120 degrees.

zh: 闫博去也可以自动展开并外界扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分字母的场景要求。
en: The studio area can also be automatically expanded, and come with an external expansion platform of more than 50 square meters, which matches the scene requirements of most programs.

zh: 燕山的昆明市东川区已是夏日炎炎，二比天气更火热的，是一粒半钱半只莲塘的扶贫车间。
en: Summer is boiling hot in Kunming’s Dongchuan District, but poverty alleviation workshops next to population relocation sites are heating up faster than the summer thermometer.

zh: 昆明20伏电子科技公司员工吕亮村现在艺术家们教警察们儿，转前股价两步，多亏了工会组织的免费职业技能培训。
en: Lv Ling, Kunming Aisifu Electronics Technology Company employee, says, “Now, I walk right out of my house and right into the factory gate, I can earn money and take care of my family at the same time, and it’s all thanks to the free vocational training arranged by the Trade Union. “

zh: 交警东川区铜都街道电子元件加工扶贫车间，热火朝天的忙碌画面，映入眼帘。
en: A bustling scene unfolds before your eyes as you walk into the electronics component processing poverty alleviation workshop on Tongdu Street in Dongchuan District.

zh: 40多岁的李林是位单亲妈妈，一个人带孩子还要照顾年迈的父母。
en: Lu Ling, now in her 40’s, is a single mother who supports her child and her elderly parents by herself.

zh: 在他最困难的时候，东川区总工会党组出主意，想办法跑前忙后雪中送炭。
en: When things were at their most difficult for her, the Dongchuan District Federation of Trade Unions helped her find solutions and provided all kinds of aid that was like “a glass of water in the desert”.

zh: 2018年起，绿林享受到住房就学社保，就业等帮扶政策和各级工会走访的办法。
en: Since 2018, she has enjoyed housing, school, social insurance, and employment assistance from policies and assistance funding from trade unions at every level.

zh: 教练，他的孩子已经顺利毕业并就业，他本人也在参加理论培训后有了工作和收入，已于4月底脱坑。
en: This year, her child graduated and found a job, and she herself found a job and gained an income after receiving vocational training, which finally helped her escape her difficult situation in late April.

zh: 语气，东川区组织助力脱贫攻坚专项技能培训项目是云南省总工会技能培训工作的一部分。
en: According to reports, the Special Poverty Alleviation Vocational Skills Training Program organized by the Dongchuan District Party Committee is part of the Yunnan Provincial Federation of Trade Unions skills training work.

zh: 去总结和概括与利福平搬迁安置点困难职工的特点，深入调查了解配送需求，确定培训工种，经济计划培训，电工，焊工面试等共计450人。
en: Based on the unique characteristics of poverty alleviation for the recently relocated employment-challenged in the district, the District Committee has conducted in-depth investigations to understand training requirements and determine the types of vocational training to be conducted, and in the near future plans to train a total of 450 electricians, welders, and pastry chefs.

zh: 今日农业银行云南孟连县，智行员工利益给县总工会写了一份，一切的感性。
en: Li Yi, an employee at the Agricultural Bank’s Yunnan Menglian County Branch, recently wrote a heartfelt letter of thanks to the County Federation of Trade Unions.

zh: 他在信中诚挚的感谢了从2013年8月到2017年1月之间工会基于他的进球助学款帮助他完成学业。
en: In her letter, she offered sincere thanks for the Golden Autumn Scholarship she received from the trade union from August 2013 to January 2017, which allowed her to complete her studies.

zh: 2004年，离异的父亲因车祸去世，目前被纳入困难职工档案，此后一直享受建档立卡政策的官。
en: After Li Yi’s father passed away in a car accident in 2004, her mother received employment-challenged status, and has enjoyed the benefits of inclusion in the system since.

zh: 在当地工会的帮扶下顺利完成学业。
en: With the help of the local trade union, Li Yi successfully completed her studies.

zh: 2016年以来，通过制度保证和精准帮扶，实现脱空3809户。
en: Since 2016, systemic guarantees and targeted assistance have lifted 3,809 households out of poverty.

zh: 与另一家和利益的成功皆空托孔，是用弹弓会推进困难职工解困脱困工作的一个缩影。
en: The successful poverty relief offered to Lv Ling’s family and Li Yi are a window into the poverty alleviation efforts for the employment-challenged of Yunnan’s trade unions.

zh: 据云南省总工会法律和维权工作部，工作人员断开院减少省加强困难职工档案动态管理，推动建党工作常态化，对符合检查条件的困难职工及时纳入帮扶启动拓宽困难职工申请渠道，用用卫星开通网上申请困难职工建档服务平台放。
en: According to Duan Kaiyuan, who works at the Yunnan Provincial Federation of Trade Unions in the Legal and Rights Protection Work Department, the Federation’s provincial headquarters has enhanced its dynamic management of the employment-challenged filing system, pushed normalize filing for assistance, and worked to actively bring those qualified for employment-challenged status into assistance systems; they have also expanded channels to apply for employment-challenged status by creating a WeChat application platform to make it easier for the employment-challenged to seek and apply for assistance on their own.

zh: 一星期见，外出无空，为帮助困难职工缓解生活压力，用男声中安排1300余万元送温暖制定按照全无记载的困难职工每户2000元，省级财政困难职工每户1500元，标准对6000余户全国级和1000余户生计，采档困难职工是。
en: During the epidemic, seeking work outside the home has been difficult, so to help alleviate pressure on the livelihoods of the employment-challenged, the Yunnan Province Central Party Committee has arranged a total of 13 million yuan in “Delivering Comfort” aid, providing 2,000 yuan to every household in the national employment-challenged database and 1,500 yuan to every household in the provincial employment-challenged database, aid that reached a total of 6,000 employment-challenged households nationally and 1,000 employment-challenged households in the province through the special program.

zh: 同时圣工与人社部门和智联招聘等各类互联网招聘平台推介，将招聘信息推送给困难职工提供就业咨询，就业指导等服务。
en: At the same time, the Yunnan Province Central Party Committee, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, zhaopin.com, and other online job recruitment sites worked together to push job recruitment information to the employment-challenged, provide employment consulting and guidance, and provide other services.
